posts.post_content:
The following Old Judges (all Cincinnati) are for sale, prices include shipping.

Kid Baldwin - Ball in Right Hand - Nice image, trimmed, no creases, writing and some stains on back - $150

Tony Mullane - Standing Ball in Hand - Nice clear but light image, very small paper loss along top edge, no creases, writing on back - $200

Hugh Nicol - Catch Stretching - Nice clear but light image, very small wrinkle near left top corner, no creases, some writing and a small stain on back - $200

John Reilly - Throw Right Hand - Great image, no creases, may be trimmed a little short, light stain on back - $200

Leon Viau - Rear back to throw - Very clear and strong image, no creases, light corner wear, clean back - SOLD!

Tom
